description: Number of partitions of n into prime power parts (1 included); number of nonisomorphic Abelian subgroups of symmetric group S_n.
links: Index entries for sequences related to groups
prog: (PARI) lista(m) = {x = t + t*O(t^m); gf = prod(k=1, m, if (isprimepower(k), 1/(1-x^k), 1))/(1-x); for (n=0, m, print1(polcoeff(gf, n, t), ", "));} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 09 2013
crossrefs: Cf. A009490, A023894 (first differences), A062297 (number of Abelian subgroups).
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
